newsitem.title: UK: UK delivered grain trades - Mar 24.
newsitem.headline: UK delivered grain trades - Mar 24.

text.p: UK grain brokers reported the following delivered grain trades at 1515 gmt, in Sterling a tonne -
Feed wheat to Norfolk/Suffolk May 104.00/04.50/05.00/05.25 Jul 107.00 Oct/Dec 101.00
No mill wheat or feed barley business was reported.
